🏰 Guild
✕

Guild System Active

• Create or join guilds (100 members)
• Guild wars and territory control
• Shared guild bank and perks
• Customizable guild halls

⚔️ PvP Arena
✕

Arena System Active

• Ranked PvP battles
• 1v1, 2v2, 3v3, 5v5 arenas
• Seasonal rewards and titles
• Competitive leaderboards

🏛️ Dungeons
✕

Dungeon System Active

• Procedurally generated dungeons
• Mythic+ difficulty scaling
• Epic loot and rewards
• 5-player cooperative content

🏠 Housing
✕

Housing System Active

• Customizable player homes
• Furniture and decorations
• Invite friends to visit
• Property trading system

🔨 Crafting
✕

Crafting System Active

• Blacksmithing, Alchemy, Enchanting
• Complex recipes and quality tiers
• Gather resources from the world
• Craft legendary equipment

🐾 Pets
✕

Pet System Active

• Collect and battle pets
• 20+ battle pets with evolution
• Type advantages system
• Turn-based pet combat

🎮 Mini-Games
✕

13 Mini-Games Available

• Rhythm Game • Puzzle Games
• Racing Game • Card Game
• Tower Defense • Idle Game
• Boss Rush • Platformer
• Survival Mode • Archery Range
• Horde Defense • Dice Games
• Pet Battles

🏪 Marketplace
✕

Marketplace System Active

• Global auction house
• Buy and sell items 24/48 hours
• Price history tracking
• Player-to-player trading

💀 Raids
✕

Raid System Active

• 10+ player cooperative raids
• Multiple raid tiers and bosses
• Legendary loot drops
• World boss events
